title: [Fianne's Beds and Bedding]
description: Narrow lancet windows and hundreds of tiny candles flood Fianne's stylish bed shop with light.  Pallets heaped with enormous pillows stand beside neat rows of beds in a wide variety of styles and finishes.  Fianne's discreet but attentive service and the pleasing surroundings of her store make for a pleasurable shopping experience.

Narrow lancet windows and hundreds of tiny candles flood Fianne's stylish bed shop with warm golden light.  Pallets heaped with enormous pillows stand beside neat rows of beds in a wide variety of styles and finishes.  Fianne's discreet but attentive service and the pleasing surroundings of her store make for a pleasurable shopping experience.
